name: MissionX
description:
DEMO VERSION. Game TopDown. You must be to complete several missions.

In each mission you must face zombies terrorist monsters ...

Important is to collect the weapons and ammunition which you will find on the different maps. You will need them in the following missions which you will complete.

In game:
M: Edit Settings
N: Show FPS
P: Pause

There are 10 missions to complete which will give you many hours of fun

FULL VERSION : https://gamejolt.com/games/missionx/518341
